macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: Dow Jones Hits Near 49,000 as Energy Sector Surges
items.summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average reached an all-time high of 48,977.18, gaining 1.23% as energy stocks rallied following a 1.9% rise in crude oil prices to $58.40 per barrel. The broader market showed strong momentum with the S&P 500 closing above 6,900 for the first time ever.

items.title: S&P 500 Breaks 6,900 Barrier; Nasdaq Snaps Losing Streak
items.summary: The S&P 500 closed at 6,902.05 (+0.64%), marking its first-ever close above 6,900, while the Nasdaq Composite gained 0.69% to 23,395.82, ending a 5-day losing streak. The VIX fell 2.94% to 14.51, reflecting reduced market volatility.

items.title: Treasury Yields Fall as Fed Expected to Maintain Dovish Stance
items.summary: The 10-year Treasury yield declined below 4.16% as market participants anticipate the Federal Reserve will maintain its dovish monetary policy amid signs of cooling economic activity and slight manufacturing contraction.

items.title: Energy Stocks Lead Market Rally; Chevron Gains 5.1%
items.summary: Energy sector stocks drove market gains, with Chevron climbing 5.1% and Goldman Sachs advancing 3.7% as top Dow performers. The sector rotation lifted the Dow Jones nearly 600 points amid rising crude oil prices.

items.title: Tesla Rebounds 3.1% on AI Announcement Anticipation
items.summary: Tesla stock jumped 3.1% to $451.67, breaking its recent downward trend as investors anticipate AI-related announcements at CES 2026. The recovery in high-beta tech names reflects broader market stabilization.

items.title: Commodities Rally as Dollar Weakens; Silver and Platinum Surge 6%
items.summary: Precious metals led a broad commodity rally with silver and platinum each rising 6% as the US Dollar weakened against major currencies. Risk-centric currencies gained heavily at the expense of the dollar and Canadian dollar.

items.title: Labor Market Data in Focus; Jobs Report Due Friday
items.summary: Investors are preparing for a slate of labor market data this week, with the December jobs report (NFP) scheduled for Friday expected to provide clarity on the Federal Reserve's policy outlook for 2026.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Surges Past $93,000 as Crypto Market Starts 2026 Strong
items.summary: Bitcoin has climbed over $93,000 with the broader crypto market posting strong gains driven by new-year allocations, institutional demand through spot Bitcoin ETFs, and a pro-crypto regulatory shift following the 2024 election.

items.title: Vitalik Buterin Sets New Year's Resolution for Ethereum
items.summary: Ethereum founder Vitalik Buterin announced on January 1 that it's time for Ethereum to deliver on its original mission to build 'the world computer that serves as a central infrastructure piece of a more free and open internet,' urging the community to accelerate progress.

items.title: XRP and Dogecoin Post Strong Early 2026 Gains
items.summary: XRP has recovered 16.29% so far in 2026 trading at $2.14, while Dogecoin jumped 24.44% to 15 cents, showing varying recovery patterns across altcoins as the market rebounds from late-2025 volatility.

items.title: Major Banks Including Morgan Stanley Enter Spot Bitcoin ETF Market
items.summary: Morgan Stanley, Wells Fargo, and Merrill Lynch have opened their platforms to allocate capital into spot Bitcoin ETFs, with $500 million flowing into Bitcoin ETFs on January 2 alone, reflecting widening institutional adoption.

items.title: FASB to Explore Stablecoin Treatment as Cash Equivalents
items.summary: The Financial Accounting Standards Board will formally explore whether firms can treat stablecoins as cash equivalents, marking a key development in corporate accounting standards.

items.title: PWC Leans Into Crypto Services Amid Favorable Regulatory Environment
items.summary: The U.S. head of PWC announced the consulting firm is actively providing audits and advice to crypto clients, following similar moves by other Big 4 firms in response to the new regulatory environment.

items.title: Truth Social Announces Trump Token Airdrop to Shareholders
items.summary: Truth Social announced an upcoming token drop to shareholders via Crypto.com that will not be transferable or exchangeable for cash but could become redeemable for Trump Media discounts.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: MIT Researchers Develop AI Model CleaveNet for Early Cancer Detection Sensors
items.summary: MIT scientists created CleaveNet, an AI protein language model that designs peptides targeted by cancer-related proteases for highly sensitive diagnostics. The model generates novel, efficient sequences, potentially enabling at-home kits to detect 30 cancer types early.

items.title: WiMi Launches Multi-Channel Quantum Convolutional Neural Network for Real-World Data Processing
items.summary: WiMi Hologram Cloud introduced a hardware-adaptable quantum CNN for multi-channel supervised learning, advancing quantum AI for image classification, medical imaging, and multimodal data. It enables commercial quantum deep learning applications beyond lab settings.

items.title: Accenture Agrees to Acquire UK AI Firm Faculty to Boost Enterprise AI Capabilities
items.summary: Accenture will acquire Faculty, adding 400 AI experts and its Faculty Frontier decision intelligence product to enhance secure AI for business processes. Faculty previously built the UK's NHS COVID-19 Early Warning System.

items.title: Industry Experts Predict Agentic AI to Transform Drug Pipelines into 'Smart-Pipelines' in 2026
items.summary: BIO-IT World reports trends including agentic AI autonomously optimizing drug R&D, AI orchestration across models, and AI biomarkers for early disease detection in cancer and neurodegeneration. Humans shift to oversight roles for faster, adaptive pipelines.

items.title: Samsung Highlights Trust-by-Design AI with Transparency and User Control at CES 2026
items.summary: At CES 2026, Samsung's AI Platform Center emphasized predictable, transparent AI systems allowing users to control local/cloud models and data security for personalized experiences.

items.title: IBM Renews Long-Term Partnership as AI, Cloud Partner for Wimbledon Tennis Club
items.summary: IBM announced a multi-year renewal as the official AI, cloud, and digital transformation partner for The All England Lawn Tennis Club, enhancing operations with AI-powered solutions.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
